reviewText: I love this video! I have bought many copies over the years, but when I loan them out, they tend to disappear. Such great photography it is super impressive. Beautiful stuff! And I learned a lot too. I teach a class to kids on seeds and this is what I have them watch. Covers pretty much everything. Love it!
Love this DVD! Great science movie. The kids love it!
Great movie, was a plus to add to my homeschool collection of things! My boys enjoyed watching it! Thank you

I recently purchased this movie thinking it was about the 70s mega rock group Journey, it was not! This wasn't the first time I was fool on Amazon, a while ago I purchased the movie Die Hard thinking it was a documentary about the batteries, instead it was about a guy trapped in a building during Christmas. I suggest you read the about the product before purchasing.

I loved this video.  The color, photography, presentation are just
awesome and inspiring.  This one had parts that left me in tears at
what God has done.  Moody has a grasp on how to present info. in a
way that grips and inspires ones heart and head.

My children love these videos. Although they are just 7 and 9 years old, they learn something everytime they watch any of them - and so do I! These videos have a great way of presenting the amazing wonders of nature and God's handywork all around us. We purchased the 19 DVD set Moody Science Classics: 19-DVD Set, and it was well worth it!!!
